name: svelte-mac-os-frame
description: Render macOS window frame component for Svelte applications.
readme: ![package size](https://img.shields.io/github/size/nergel3/svelte-mac-os-frame/src/index.svelte) ![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/svelte-mac-os-frame?color=green) # svelte-mac-os-frame > A mac os window frame svelte component. ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/negrel/svelte-mac-os-frame/master/resources/frame2.jpeg) ### Installation ``` npm install svelte-mac-os-frame ``` ### Example Live example [here](https://negrel.dev/svelte-fullpage.js/#page2). **Customized example:** ```html ``` ![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/negrel/svelte-mac-os-frame/master/resources/frame1.jpeg) ### :stars: Show Your Support Please give a :star: if this project helped you! #### :scroll: License MIT Â© Alexandre Negrel
